ch1/section-1_1.html.title: Section 1.1: examples
ch1/section-1_1.html.body: Section 1.1: examples S_{\frac{1}{T}}(f) \triangleq \underbrace{\sum_{k=-\infty}^{\infty} S\left(f-\frac{k}{T}\right) \equiv \overbrace{\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} s[n] \cdot e^{-i 2 \pi f n T}}^{\text{Fourier Series (DTFT)}}}_{\text { Possion Summation}} =\mathcal{F}\left\{\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} s[n] \delta(t-n T)\right\} S1T(f)≜∑k=−∞∞S(f−kT)≡∑n=−∞∞s[n]⋅e−i2πfnT S_{\frac{1}{T}}(f) \triangleq \sum_{k=-\infty}^{\infty} S\left(f-\frac{k}{T}\right) \equiv \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} s[n] \cdot e^{-i 2 \pi f n T} S​​T​​1​​​​(f)≜​k=−∞​∑​∞​​S(f−​T​​k​​)≡​n=−∞​∑​∞​​s[n]⋅e​−i2πfnT​​ =F{∑n=−∞∞s[n]δ(t−nT)} =\mathcal{F}\left\{\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} s[n] \delta(t-n T)\right\} =F{​n=−∞​∑​∞​​s[n]δ(t−nT)} YifanZhang © all right reserved，powered by GitbookLast Edit Time： 2019-01-28 12:23:11
